name: LNKO USA, Inc.
description: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to offer trendy eyewear. The company's platform provides a collection of optic wearables for both men and women, enabling users to choose from a variety of frame styles and colors of eyeglasses.
one_liner: Operator of an e-commerce platform intended to offer trendy eyewear. The company's platform provides a collection of optic wearables for both men and women, enabling users to choose from a variety of frame styles and colors of eyeglasses.
